titleStmt.title: The praise of brotherhood: or, A description of hoodes writ in verse, not in prose shewing which best becomes the nose. To the tune of Abington Fayre.
titleStmt.author: I. D.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "To fashions strange the world is bent ..."
Probably by the same author as STC 6169. Cf. STC.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
